name: part_007
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2026 ーLife is GAMEー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [_tBlI-l8WLk]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal and a male character in a dark, cage-like setting performing a dramatic scene.
Performance of 'Whisper Whisper Whisper' with backup dancers in a cage setting.
High-energy performance of 'BANG!!!' with laser lights.

subtitles.original: このコインは...
subtitles.english: This coin is...

subtitles.original: はぁ...そうか。
subtitles.english: Hah... I see.

subtitles.original: 君はそっちなんだね。
subtitles.english: So you're on that side.

subtitles.original: そっち？
subtitles.english: That side?

subtitles.original: ここに座って。
subtitles.english: Sit here.

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: この後は...
subtitles.english: What happens next...

subtitles.original: 君次第だよ。
subtitles.english: is up to you.

subtitles.original: 忘れられないのはこの目のせい
subtitles.english: It's this eye's fault I can't forget

subtitles.original: 赤く残る過ち 甘噛みの跡
subtitles.english: The mistake remains red, a trace of a playful bite

subtitles.original: 溢れ出す愛は止め処もない
subtitles.english: The overflowing love is endless

subtitles.original: 誰もいない間に悪魔を探そう
subtitles.english: Let's look for the devil while no one is here

subtitles.original: 作り笑いはこの耳のせい
subtitles.english: The fake smile is this ear's fault

subtitles.original: 深い壁の中から呼びかける声
subtitles.english: A voice calling out from within the deep walls

subtitles.original: Whisper Whisper Whisper まだ触らせない
subtitles.english: Whisper Whisper Whisper, I won't let you touch yet

subtitles.original: この檻を抜け出して悪魔は賭ける
subtitles.english: Escaping this cage, the devil makes a bet

subtitles.original: 鏡の前でこの口のせい
subtitles.english: In front of the mirror, it's this mouth's fault

subtitles.original: 伝えたい言葉さえ噛み殺す夜
subtitles.english: A night where I stifle even the words I want to say

subtitles.original: Whisper Whisper Whisper まだ打ち明けない
subtitles.english: Whisper Whisper Whisper, I won't confess yet

subtitles.original: 神様を裏切って悪魔と過ごす
subtitles.english: Betraying God to spend time with the devil

subtitles.original: アイマイミー夢見ていたい貴方に
subtitles.english: I, my, me, I want to keep dreaming of you

subtitles.original: そっと気付かせてあげたいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to make you realize softly

subtitles.original: Oh 貴方にも
subtitles.english: Oh, to you too

subtitles.original: Oh 貴方にも
subtitles.english: Oh, to you too

subtitles.original: Oh 貴方にも
subtitles.english: Oh, to you too

subtitles.original: 消えない傷を隠したい
subtitles.english: I want to hide the indelible scars

subtitles.original: 貴方にそっと悩ませてあげたいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to make you worry a little

subtitles.original: Oh 貴方にも
subtitles.english: Oh, to you too

subtitles.original: Oh 貴方にも
subtitles.english: Oh, to you too

subtitles.english: I search for the devil

subtitles.english: Whisper Whisper Whisper, I won't let you touch yet

subtitles.english: Escaping this cage, the devil makes a bet

subtitles.english: In front of the mirror, it's this mouth's fault

subtitles.original: 伝えたい言葉さえ噛み殺す夜
subtitles.english: A night where I stifle even the words I want to say

subtitles.original: Whisper Whisper Whisper まだ打ち明けない
subtitles.english: Whisper Whisper Whisper, I won't confess yet

subtitles.original: 神様を裏切って悪魔と過ごす
subtitles.english: Betraying God to spend time with the devil

subtitles.original: 好き嫌い常識 I don't care 吹き飛ばせば
subtitles.english: Likes, dislikes, common sense, I don't care, just blow it away

subtitles.original: かかってこい Majority アタシに負けはなし
subtitles.english: Bring it on, Majority, I never lose

subtitles.original: ここまでって引かれたそのボーダー誰のルール？
subtitles.english: Who's rule decided that border drawn up to here?

subtitles.original: あの日乗り越えた Weak heart
subtitles.english: The weak heart I overcame that day

subtitles.original: 強くなったアタシが笑い飛ばすだけ
subtitles.english: Now that I'm stronger, I just laugh it off

subtitles.original: 言いたいことは言う
subtitles.english: I say what I want to say

subtitles.original: やりたくないことはしない
subtitles.english: I don't do what I don't want to do

subtitles.original: 悪意気にしない
subtitles.english: I don't care about malice

subtitles.original: みんな違うの当然だし
subtitles.english: It's natural that everyone is different

subtitles.original: アタシも変わらない譲れないの
subtitles.english: I won't change either, I won't yield

subtitles.original: 自分だけは
subtitles.english: myself.

subtitles.original: Ready ready set I want to be free
subtitles.english: Ready ready set I want to be free

subtitles.original: 明日のことはもう言わない
subtitles.english: I won't talk about tomorrow anymore

subtitles.original: それじゃ何も変えられない
subtitles.english: That won't change anything

subtitles.original: Ready ready set I want to be strong
subtitles.english: Ready ready set I want to be strong

subtitles.original: 守りたい自分肯定
subtitles.english: I want to protect my self-affirmation

subtitles.original: 生きてるんだアタシ
subtitles.english: I am living

subtitles.original: 運命決めてるんだだし
subtitles.english: Because I'm deciding my fate

subtitles.original: 声上げて生まれたバースから選んできたんだ
subtitles.english: I've been choosing since the birth I cried out for

subtitles.original: 思い出せ アタシはアタシだ 他の誰でもない
subtitles.english: Remember, I am me, nobody else

subtitles.original: 何一つもない 嘘じゃないない
subtitles.english: There's nothing, it's not a lie

subtitles.original: 大事なファンに
subtitles.english: To my important fans

subtitles.original: 好き嫌い常識 I don't care 吹き飛ばせば
subtitles.english: Likes, dislikes, common sense, I don't care, just blow it away

subtitles.original: Filter 外して この lyric かまして
subtitles.english: Take off the filter, drop this lyric

subtitles.original: わからす挑発
subtitles.english: A provocation to make you understand

subtitles.original: 下向いて舌打ちからの HA
subtitles.english: Looking down, clicking my tongue, then HA

subtitles.original: Excuse me?
subtitles.english: Excuse me?
